name: Alien Chase (Peridop)
description:
Quick little game that was made in around 24 hours, spread out across 4 days, this game was made to that I could get back into coding again using Unity as university work kept me from it so it's nothing amazing, just a simple runner game with one level that is randomly generated :D

Controls:

A  - Move Right
D - Move Left
Space - Jump

----------------------------------------

Aim of the Game:

Reach the end of the level and collect all the dogs!

----------------------------------------

Tips:

- Aliens can't see you or abduct you when covered by a building!
- If an alien gets too close you will be 'abducted' to the start of the level!
